name: Dark Rabbit (improved)
description:
Let's be honest, the Feb 5 update is total shit.
I've edited the "groups" and "rooms" page so that they're not total eyesores, but I don't know how to fix the chat cut off--- I noticed another guy did that.

Props to him!
You might have to edit the options of it to make it work alongside mine.
Pro: it's no longer an eyesore.
Con: No fullscreen.
